Key Match Events: Virat Kohli was dismissed by Saurabh Netravalkar for a golden duck
Rohit Sharma was dismissed by Saurabh Netravalkar
Rishabh Pant was dismissed by Ali Khan
Suryakumar Yadav and Shivam Dube shared a 35-ball 50+ partnership
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and asked USA to bat in seaming conditions
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav praised India's resilience and credited his teammates for the win
India are now through to the Super Eights, but USA are still very much masters of their own fate
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Nassau County Stadium, a venue where India had previously played four games
USA had several things going against them, including the conditions, personnel, and experience
